subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Rain delayed the game 1 hour 28 minutes and left the stands mostly vacant, but the Mets’ bad-weather ace, Jon Niese, let up just one run over seven innings to help defeat the Phillies.
snippet: Rain delayed the game 1 hour 28 minutes and left the stands mostly vacant, but the Mets’ bad-weather ace, Jon Niese, let up just one run over seven innings to help defeat the Phillies.
